mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNNCRD (NCRD_ID, NM, NCRD_TRGTER_ID, EXTRL_USER_AT, OTHBC_AT, CLSF_NM, OFCPS_NM, CMPNY_NM, DEPT_NM, EMAIL_ADRES, TELNO, NATION_NO, AREA_NO, MIDDLE_TELNO, END_TELNO, MBTLNUM, IDNTFC_NO, MIDDLE_MBTLNUM, END_MBTLNUM, ADRES, DETAIL_ADRES, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, RM ) VALUES ( #{ncrdId}, #{ncrdNm}, #{ncrdTrgterId}, #{extrlUserAt}, #{othbcAt}, #{clsfNm}, #{ofcpsNm}, #{cmpnyNm}, #{deptNm}, #{emailAdres}, #{telNo}, #{nationNo}, #{areaNo}, #{middleTelNo}, #{endTelNo}, #{mbtlNum}, #{idntfcNo}, #{middleMbtlNum}, #{endMbtlNum}, #{adres}, #{detailAdres}, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATE, #{remark} )
INSERT INTO COMTNNCRDUSER (NCRD_ID, EMPLYR_ID, CREAT_DT, REGIST_SE_CODE, USE_AT) VALUES (#{ncrdId}, #{emplyrId}, SYSDATE, #{registSeCode}, #{useAt})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT NCRD_ID, NM, NCRD_TRGTER_ID, OTHBC_AT, EXTRL_USER_AT, CMPNY_NM, DEPT_NM, IDNTFC_NO, MIDDLE_MBTLNUM, END_MBTLNUM, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID FROM COMTNNCRD WHERE OTHBC_AT = 'Y'
AND NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND CMPNY_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
ORDER BY NM ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(NCRD_ID) FROM COMTNNCRD WHERE OTHBC_AT = 'Y' AND NCRD_ID NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT NCRD_ID FROM COMTNNCRDUSER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{emplyrId} )
AND NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND CMPNY_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(NCRD_ID) FROM COMTNNCRD WHERE FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{frstRegisterId}
AND NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND CMPNY_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'

SELECT NCRD_ID, NM, NCRD_TRGTER_ID, EXTRL_USER_AT, OTHBC_AT, CLSF_NM, OFCPS_NM, CMPNY_NM, DEPT_NM, EMAIL_ADRES, TELNO, NATION_NO, AREA_NO, MIDDLE_TELNO, END_TELNO, MBTLNUM, IDNTFC_NO, MIDDLE_MBTLNUM, END_MBTLNUM, ADRES, DETAIL_ADRES, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, RM FROM COMTNNCRD WHERE NCRD_ID = #{ncrdId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNNCRD SET NM = #{ncrdNm}, EXTRL_USER_AT = #{extrlUserAt}, OTHBC_AT = #{othbcAt}, CLSF_NM = #{clsfNm}, OFCPS_NM = #{ofcpsNm}, CMPNY_NM = #{cmpnyNm}, DEPT_NM = #{deptNm}, EMAIL_ADRES = #{emailAdres}, TELNO = #{telNo}, NATION_NO = #{nationNo}, AREA_NO = #{areaNo}, MIDDLE_TELNO = #{middleTelNo}, END_TELNO = #{endTelNo}, MBTLNUM = #{mbtlNum}, IDNTFC_NO = #{idntfcNo}, MIDDLE_MBTLNUM = #{middleMbtlNum}, END_MBTLNUM = #{endMbtlNum}, ADRES = #{adres}, DETAIL_ADRES = #{detailAdres}, RM = #{remark}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE WHERE NCRD_ID = #{ncrdId}

AND b.NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
